title: Top champion (?)
body:
I was going to buy rengar but now he got nerfed and I don't know if he's still worth in top.
I usually play top and my champions are Darius, Renekton, Olaf and Zed( I use him only mid).
What should I buy now? I was also going to buy Wukong and Phanteon, any advice?

replies.body:
Well Wukong is a good pick for the top lane, but he has some problems in to the Jungler.
Phanteon is very strong in early but in late he became unusual, like renekton and Xin Zhao. However phaneon can be use in top lane and jungler but he has a mana dipendence.
I recomand you to buy wukong. he is not easy to play early. His segret is to know how his W work. XD
So Have fun with Wukong's Juke XD

Thank you, I'll buy Wukong soon and I'll wait more time for Phanteon. 
What about Rengar? Is he worth or I should spend 6300 credits with another champion?

I don't know maybe he will stay in to the jungler XD
i think that riot whant to do the same think that they did to hecarim top.
if you have 6300 ip i will wait, just to think:
What is my lane?
What is my secondary lane?
 What kind of champ i usually play? this ask is very important because in lol there are passive champions and aggressive champions...so you must know your style and then you make the chooise.
Rengar is not easy to play. Generally i recomand him into the jungler. Now with the new sistem of ranked you need a secondary role so if you wanna do the jungler buy him.
However the first thing that you must consider is: this champ is funny for me? afther that do your choise.
